com.radirius.mercury.graphics
Class Shader

java.lang.Object
  com.radirius.mercury.graphics.Shader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resource, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Shader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Resource

An object version of shaders. Does all of the tedious stuff for you and lets you use the shader easily.

Author:
wessles, opiop65, Jeviny

getShader

public static Shader getShader(java.io.InputStream vertexIn,
                               java.io.InputStream fragmentIn)
Parameters:
vertexIn - The vertex shader's file
fragmentIn - The fragment shader's file.
Returns:
A shader based off of the files in vin and fin.

getShader

public static Shader getShader(java.lang.String vertexSource,
                               java.lang.String fragmentSource)
Parameters:
vertexSource - The source of the vertex shader.
fragmentSource - The source of the fragment shader.
Returns:
A shader based off of the sources vertexSource and fragmentSource.

getShader

public static Shader getShader(java.io.InputStream source,
                               int type)
Parameters:
source - The stream to the source file.
type - The type of shader (the other half will use the MERCury default shader).
Returns:
A shader based off of the stream source, of the type type.

getShader

public static Shader getShader(java.lang.String source,
                               int type)
Parameters:
source - The source of the shader.
type - The type of shader (the other half will use the Mercury defaults).
Returns:
A shader based off of the source of the type type.
